question: What will be the US CPI inflation rate (YoY) for December 2025?
description: Predict the annual (year-over-year) Consumer Price Index (CPI) inflation rate for December 2025. Source: BLS 'All items' unadjusted.
resolutionCriteria:
Resolves to the 'All items' unadjusted 12-month percent change.
- Date: Jan 13, 2026.
- Hard Lock: 8:00 AM ET.
- Value scaling: 2.70% = 270.
